suggestion_en: Practice deep breathing or mindfulness daily.
suggestion_ta: தினசரி ஆழமான மூச்சு பயிற்சி அல்லது மனநிலை புலனாய்வை செய்யவும்.

suggestion_en: Practice deep breathing or mindfulness daily.

symptom_trigger_question: Do you frequently feel nervous or anxious?
Do you feel exhausted even after rest?
suggestion_en: Avoid overcommitting and take regular breaks.
